## Facade.alias property

Register shorthand for resolving modules using webpack aliases.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
alias: alias.facade;
```

## Remarks

Useful for situations that may otherwise require brittle relative paths.

## Example


```js
app.alias({
  '@scripts': app.path('src', 'scripts'),
})
```
